drawnet.lib.ddl
Class PlaneType

java.lang.Object
  drawnet.lib.ddl.PlaneType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class PlaneType
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Defines a plane.

Planes are a way to logically divide the model in different sets (e.g. graphical, results, model logic). This is useful to extract and process easily all of the elements in a given set.

See Also:
Formalism.addPlane(String, int), Formalism.removePlane(String), Formalism.renamePlane(String, String)
